description: Adds an alias to the set of a given member (user or group) of WorkMail.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The organization under which the member (user or group) exists.

parameters.name: EntityId
parameters.description: The member (user or group) to which this alias is added.

parameters.name: Alias
parameters.description: The alias to add to the member set.
